description.ko: 중력이 빛을 굴절시키고 무한한 공허 앞에서 시간이 모든 의미를 잃는 심우주의 절대적인 정적과 압도적인 규모를 시각적으로 탐구합니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of the absolute silence and overwhelming scale of the deep cosmos, where gravity bends light and time loses all meaning in the face of the infinite void.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a massive, swirling black hole at the center of a deep indigo galaxy, glowing accretion disk with particles of starlight being pulled into the dark center, nebulae of deep purple and teal gas clouds, ultra-high resolution, ethereal lighting, photorealistic space photography, 8k, vast emptiness of the cosmic void.
